title: Poster, Urban Open Spaces, ca. 1980
inscribed: Imprinted in white at upper center: Urban/Open/Spaces/Open Spaces: Temporary and Accidental/The Mount Sinai Medical Center/Fifth Avenue at 100th Street/Streets/Street Graphics and Street Furniture/Cooper-Hewitt Museum/2 East 91st Street/Playgrounds/Asphalt Green/90th Street/at the East River; at center left: Made Landscapes/The Parks Department's/Arsenal Gallery/830 Fifth Avenue/at 64th Street; at center right: Open Spaces/In New Towns/Good Shepherd Plaza,/Roosevelt Island; at lower center right: Plazas/McGraw-Hill Plaza/49th Street and Avenue of the Americas; at lower right: Conceptual Open Spaces/Henry Street Settlement/466 Grand Street; at lower left: Pedestrian Malls/Chase Manhattan Plaza; at lower center: Parks In the City/Federal Hall/26 Wall Street/Urban Waterfronts:/Special Urban Spaces/South Street Seaport Museum.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Urban Open Spaces, ca. 1980. Screenprint. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1993-15-4
